segments.text: Looking in, the kitchen has that homey feel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window open to the garden, nice and bright.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sinkâ€”water's flooding out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's polishing away, foot in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must be deaf to the splashing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over there, the boy's climbing for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's reaching up, excited for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so sneaky, mom none the wiser.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets will be ruined from the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene's chaotic under the surface.
segments.speaker: PAR
